content: i don t often sit down with a specific design or idea in mind but when i was invited to join in on the friends around the world cal well how could i say no delilah is a homage to the beautiful wildflowers that spring into bloom every year along the west coast of south africa i hope you will enjoy making her as much as i enjoyed creating her if you are making delilah for the friends are the world cal you will need to add three rounds to bring your stitches to the correct count - you can find those three rounds here - https //hookedonsunshine co/delilah-square/
